issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
See zulip discussion [here|https://ursalabs.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/180245-dev/topic/zstd.20cmake.20changes]

Changes to the find zstd module cause failure when  ARROW_ZSTD_USE_SHARED is used
